tool.name: GSASII Refinement Constraints
tool.description: Tool to upload files for neutron powder diffraction analysis in GSASII and perform an initial Rietveld refinement
tool.command: which conda && conda init && source ~/.bashrc && conda activate GSASII && mkdir app && cd app/ && touch $output && mkdir portal && ln -s $project gsas_project.gpx && python $__tool_directory__/gsas2_refinement_constraints.py --project-filename gsas_project.gpx --equation-variables "${eqnConstraints[0].eqnVars}" --equation-coefficients "${eqnConstraints[0].eqnCoefs}" --equation-totals ${eqnConstraints[0].eqnTotal} --equivalence-variables "${equivConstraints[0].equivVars}" --equivalence-coefficients "${equivConstraints[0].equivCoefs}" --output-directory /portal > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2)
tool.help: A tool to run a GSAS2 Rietveld refinement.
